comment: In a ` K `-regular graph, the number of walks (as words) of a fixed length ` N ` from a fixed vertex is ` K ` to the power of ` N ` . Closed form of ~ rusgrnumwwlk . (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 30-Sep-2018.) (Revised by AV, 7-May-2021.)
